title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / love did him in

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "As you look back you think: So love..."
dialogueTree.english: As you look back you think: So love did *do him in* after all.
dialogueTree.polish: Zastanawiasz się i stwierdzasz: a więc to rzeczywiście miłość go *tak urządziła*.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Вы разважаеце і вызначаеце: а значыць, гэта сапраўды каханне яго *так уладкавала*.

links.title: You: "I was right..."
links.english: I was right...
links.polish: Miałem rację...
links.belarusian: Я меў рацыю...

links.title: Inland Empire: "If it weren't for her he would not..."
links.english: If it weren't for her he would not have been there. The shot would not have connected with his soft palate...
links.polish: Gdyby nie ona, nie znalazłby się tutaj. Ta kula nie wbiłaby mu się w miękkie podniebienie...
links.belarusian: Каб не яна, ён не апынуўся б тут. Гэтая куля не ўваткнулася б яму ў мяккае неба...

links.title: You: "I already miss Klaasje."
links.english: I already miss Klaasje.
links.polish: Już teraz tęsknię za Klaasje.
links.belarusian: Я ўжо сумую па Клаасье.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Of course you do, Harry. Everyone d..."
links.english: Of course you do, Harry. Everyone does.
links.polish: Oczywiście, Harry. Jak wszyscy.
links.belarusian: Вядома, Гарры. Як усе.

links.title: Drama: "Gone forever... Sire, thee shall ne..."
links.english: Gone forever... Sire, thee shall never findeth another mistress quaint like her!
links.polish: Przepadła na zawsze... Miłościwy panie, nie znajdziesz już tak uroczej damy jak ona!
links.belarusian: Знікла назаўсёды... Міласцівы пане, вы больш не знойдзеце такой чароўнай дамы, як яна!

links.title: Half Light: "You fool! What are you waiting for?..."
links.english: You fool! What are you waiting for?! Mount a rescue operation and go get her back!
links.polish: Durniu! Na co czekasz? Zorganizuj akcję ratunkową i ją odzyskaj!
links.belarusian: Дурню! На што чакаеш? Арганізуй выратавальную аперацыю і вярні яе!

links.title: You: "I did the right thing. I know I did..."
links.english: I did the right thing. I know I did.
links.polish: Zrobiłem to, co słuszne. Wiem to na pewno.
links.belarusian: Я зрабіў тое, што правільна. Я ведаю гэта напэўна.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Feels good, doesn't it? Doing the r..."
links.english: Feels good, doesn't it? Doing the right thing.
links.polish: To dobre uczucie, nie? Robić to, co słuszne.
links.belarusian: Гэта добрае пачуццё, ці не так? Рабіць тое, што правільна.

links.title: Authority: "Hey, what is this funeral vibe here..."
links.english: Hey, what is this funeral vibe here? You did what any good cop would do. Pat yourself on the back and move on.
links.polish: Ejże, co to za grobowy nastrój? Zrobiłeś, co zrobiłby każdy dobry glina. Pogratuluj sam sobie i ruszaj dalej.
links.belarusian: Эй, што гэта за пахмурны настрой? Ты зрабіў тое, што зрабіў бы кожны добры паліцэйскі. Падзякуй сабе і ідзі далей.

links.title: Volition: "You were just being a good cop."
links.english: You were just being a good cop.
links.polish: Byłeś po prostu dobrym gliną.
links.belarusian: Ты быў проста добрым паліцэйскім.

links.title: You: "It *killed* him... (Look at Klaasje..."
links.english: It *killed* him... (Look at Klaasje.)
links.polish: *Zabiła* go... (Popatrz na Klaasje).
links.belarusian: *Забіла* яго... (Паглядзі на Клаашэ).

links.title: Inland Empire: "No. Communism killed him, remember?..."
links.english: No. Communism killed him, remember? Love made it possible. You know this much.
links.polish: Nie. Zabił go komunizm, pamiętasz? A miłość to umożliwiła. Tyle wiesz.
links.belarusian: Не. Яго забіў камунізм, памятаеш? А каханне гэта дазволіла. Вось што ты ведаеш.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Or was it communism that killed him..."
links.english: Or was it communism that killed him and love that did him in...
links.polish: Albo to komunizm go zabił, a miłość urządziła...
links.belarusian: Ці то камунізм яго забіў, а каханне ўладкавала...

links.title: You: "(Turn to Klaasje.) "Looks like love..."
links.english: (Turn to Klaasje.) "Looks like love did him in after all."
links.polish: (Odwróć się do Klaasje). „Zdaje się, że to jednak miłość go tak urządziła”.
links.belarusian: (Павярніся да Клаасіе). „Здаецца, што гэта ўсё ж такі каханне яго так зрабіла”.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): "She's silent, holding on to her cof..."
links.english: She's silent, holding on to her coffee mug. No vapour rises from it -- it's cold.
links.polish: Trzyma w milczeniu swój kubek z kawą. Nie unosi się z niego para – napój wystygnął.
links.belarusian: Трымае ў маўчанні сваю кубак з кавай. Няма пары – напой астыў.

links.title: Volition: "It appears this one has *not* been..."
links.english: It appears this one has *not* been entirely corrupted... this may help. This may help the others see.
links.polish: Wygląda na to, że *nie jest* jeszcze całkowicie zepsuta... To może być pomocne. Może inni dzięki temu zrozumieją.
links.belarusian: Падобна на тое, што *яшчэ не* зусім сапсаваная... Гэта можа быць карысна. Магчыма, іншыя дзякуючы гэтаму зразумеюць.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Remember this silence. The lady is..."
links.english: Remember this silence. The lady is dangerous. People suffer around her.
links.polish: Zapamiętaj to milczenie. Ta kobieta jest niebezpieczna. Ludzie wokół niej cierpią.
links.belarusian: Запомні гэтае маўчанне. Гэтая жанчына небяспечная. Людзі вакол яе пакутуюць.

links.title: You: "Say nothing. Let her answer."
links.english: Say nothing. Let her answer.
links.polish: Nic nie mów. Daj jej odpowiedzieć.
links.belarusian: Нічога не кажы. Дай ёй адказаць.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yeah..." she finally breaks the si..."
links.english: "Yeah..." she finally breaks the silence. "I'd like to think he didn't *love* me. Or that it was chemically-induced and not real."
links.polish: „Tak...” – przerywa w końcu milczenie. „Wolałabym myśleć, że mnie nie *kochał*. Albo że to było uczucie od prochów, a nie prawdziwe”.
links.belarusian: «Так...» – нарэшце перапыняя маўчанне. «Я б аддала перавагу думаць, што ён мяне не *кахаў*. Альбо што гэта было адчуванне ад наркотыкаў, а не сапраўднае».

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.english: "Why?"
links.polish: „Czemu?”
links.belarusian: «Чаму?»

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Easier that way." She takes a sip."
links.english: "Easier that way." She takes a sip.
links.polish: „Tak jest łatwiej” – upija łyk.
links.belarusian: «Так прасцей», — зрабіў глыток.

links.title: You: ""Was it? Real?""
links.english: "Was it? Real?"
links.polish: „A było? Prawdziwe, znaczy”.
links.belarusian: «А было? Сапраўднае, значыць».

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know..." She looks down at..."
links.english: "I don't know..." She looks down at the yard -- then back into her coffee.
links.polish: „Nie wiem...” – spogląda w dół, na podwórze, a potem na swoją kawę.
links.belarusian: «Не ведаю…» – глядзіць уніз, на двор, а потым на сваю каву.

links.title: Composure: "There's a nod, the smallest of nods..."
links.english: There's a nod, the smallest of nods.
links.polish: Kiwa głową. Bardzo delikatnie.
links.belarusian: Ківае галавой. Вельмі далікатна.

links.title: Empathy: "Real as anything."
links.english: Real as anything.
links.polish: Tak prawdziwe, jak wszystko inne.
links.belarusian: Такое ж праўдзівае, як усё іншае.

links.title: You: "What is communism in this?"
links.english: What is communism in this?
links.polish: I co w tym jest komunizmem?
links.belarusian: І што ў гэтым камунізм?

links.title: Inland Empire: "You do not know. A wind of needles...."
links.english: You do not know. A wind of needles. Airships flutter in the stratosphere.
links.polish: Nie wiesz. Wiatr kłuje niczym igły. Aerostaty migoczą w stratosferze.
links.belarusian: Не ведаеш. Вецер коле як іголкі. Аэрастаты мільгаюць у стратасферы.

links.title: You: "How do I... know all this then?"
links.english: How do I... know all this then?
links.polish: Więc skąd... ja to wszystko wiem?
links.belarusian: Дык адкуль... я гэта ўсё ведаю?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Who knows?... It's getting cold out..."
links.english: Who knows?... It's getting cold out. You should go.
links.polish: Kto odgadnie...? Na dworze robi się zimno. Powinieneś już iść.
links.belarusian: Хто здагадаецца...? На дварэ становіцца холадна. Табе ўжо трэба ісці.

links.title: You: "[Finish thought.]"
links.english: [Finish thought.]
links.polish: [Zakończ myśl].
links.belarusian: [Завяршы думку].

links.title: Inland Empire: "If it weren't for her he would not..."
links.english: If it weren't for her he would not have been there. The shot would not have connected with his soft palate...
links.polish: Gdyby nie ona, nie znalazłby się tutaj. Ta kula nie wbiłaby mu się w miękkie podniebienie...
links.belarusian: Калі б не яна, ён бы тут не апынуўся. Гэтая куля не трапіла б у яго мяккае нябёса...

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.english: [Discard thought.]
links.polish: [Odrzuć myśl].
links.belarusian: [Адхіліць думку].
